name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: It appears that, once again, I ruffled the feathers of our Kentucky fried former President.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The person who presented the award was Al Pacino, not me. We are different people. Now don’t get me wrong, I wish I was Al Pacino, I’m just not… You’d think he would know that because I’m pretty sure, ‘Say hello to my little friend!’ is what he said to Stormy Daniels that got him in all this trouble.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: That must be why they asked me to host the show again next year. Which I wasn’t planning to do, but now I might. Maybe you can watch it on the TV in the rec room at Rikers.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: I guess I should be honored the the former President of the United States took time out of his busy schedule googling ‘Ivanka in bikini’ to rant about me, but…

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: This was five weeks ago. My parents don’t even care any more.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: You keep my friend Jimmy Kimmel’s name out of your weird little wet mouth!

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: I look forward to his new campaign slogan: Trump 2024— They gave it to Green Book ?

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Now, for my viewers who do not live in New York, ‘bodega’ is Spanish for place where you can get coffee, cigarettes, spicy chips you can only get in Uruguay, dusty cans of Chef Boyardee, ginseng vitality juice that makes your hair feel like it’s screaming, and, for some reason, one electric lawnmower up on a high shelf. All run by a guy who exclusively calls you, ‘big boss.'

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Specifically, Trump chose to stop by Sanaa Convenient Store because it been the site of a violent attack that resulted in public criticism of the district attorney now prosecuting him. Or he was just there buying scratchers. ‘C’mon, c’mon! Daddy owes 454 million to the state of New York!'

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: bodega association” invited him to Harlem] “Yes, it’s true, there is a bodega association. They share an office with the International Brotherhood of Guys Selling Bootleg DVDs on a Blanket in Chinatown.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Like when he says he wants to shoot protesters and jail his opponents—what does he mean ? I can fix him.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Dumb as f**k”] “Damn, I didn’t know A.I. was coming for my job.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Momentum is building to oust [Mike] Johnson from his House speakership. And they just got rid of the last guy six months ago. ‘Republican Speaker of the House’ has joined the list of least secure jobs, just below ‘#2 leader of ISIS,’ ‘world’s oldest man,’ and ‘Rupert Murdoch’s fiancée.'

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: a style icon”] “It’s true, Trump is a style icon, whose barrier-breaking fashion choices include: tie stolen from party clown.

name: Unknown
monologue: Are you kidding me, Donald Trump? You’re gonna tell an immigrant father that his son should get into acting? What is wrong with you? As soon as you leave, the dad is gonna be like, ‘Don’t you listen to that crazy man, you’re taking this store over when I die!'

name: Unknown
monologue: By the way, if you’re from New York, you know it killed all those guys to have Trump standing around in that store, wasting everyone’s time. That owner was two seconds from being like, ‘Hey Donald, buy something or get the f**k out!'

name: Unknown
monologue: I’m surprised Trump didn’t hit up the lotto machine while he was there. Dude owes over $500 million in fines. Can you imagine owing so much money that you have to hit Powerball just to get back to zero?

name: Unknown
monologue: ‘Fascinating and mysterious?’ He’s not a Chanel fragrance.

name: Unknown
monologue: This outfit should not be for Team USA. Team Brazilian? Absolutely.

name: Unknown
monologue: It’s the harshest punishment the NBA can hand down besides making you play for the Detroit Pistons.
